metadata.name: HxxG ILLUSTRATION 0 1 ~ [ 2 0 2 2 ]
metadata.description:
Celebrating the beginning of the year 2022, the year of the tiger and the ascending sun, 'Tiger shojo' wishes everyone a happy new year! 

Going into 2022, I'm happy to introduce an exciting new project to put together a [HxxG Artbook 2022] which will be consisted of my NFT illustration pieces created in 2022.
With much brainstorming regarding how to really bring NFTs into practical use in real life, my thoughts converged into focusing on the basics:
'Book', a classic, tangible, one of the all time favorite collectibles in real life.

I believe creating an artbook really builds up on top of what I have done until now as an artist, and could really push the boundaries in creating better contents.
And thus, following benefits/perks will be provided to all the winners of the auction!

1. To show gratitude for all the support, the winners of each NFT auction will be engraved in the [HxxG Artbook 2022]
2. A hardcover version of the [HxxG Artbook 2022] will be sent to the winner of the NFTs.
